name: Grounds of Glory
description: Grounds of Glory is an online arena-based PvP game. It features destructible elements, proper projectile collision and reactive spells and abilities. Its fast-paced and action-packed combat is heavily dependant on positioning, reaction speed and aiming your projectiles.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 670 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11
